alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Wakulla and south central Leon Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Florida A and M, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Crawfordville, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Bethel, Tallahassee Regional A/P and Governors Square Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
